name: Construct Game Services
description: Access Construct-hosted game services such as leaderboards.

conditions.name: On success
conditions.description: Triggered after various actions upon completing successfully.

params.name: Type
params.description: The type of action to check completed successfully.

conditions.name: On error
conditions.description: Triggered after various actions upon failing to complete.

params.name: Type
params.description: The type of action to check if failed.

conditions.name: Is signed in
conditions.description: True if the player is currently signed in.

conditions.name: Can sign in persistent
conditions.description: True if a previous sign in which allowed persisting is available.

conditions.name: On sign in popup blocked
conditions.description: Triggered when the browser popup blocker prevents the sign in popup window appearing.

conditions.name: On create success
conditions.description: Triggered when creating a cloud save completes successfully.

params.name: Key
params.description: The storage key name (lowercase alphanumeric characters and dots only).

params.name: Bucket ID
params.description: The storage bucket ID (optional).

conditions.name: On create error
conditions.description: Triggered when creating a cloud save fails to complete.

params.name: Key
params.description: The storage key name (lowercase alphanumeric characters and dots only).

params.name: Bucket ID
params.description: The storage bucket ID (optional).

conditions.name: On get success
conditions.description: Triggered when retrieving a cloud save completes successfully.

params.name: Key
params.description: The storage key name (lowercase alphanumeric characters and dots only).

params.name: Bucket ID
params.description: The storage bucket ID (optional).

conditions.name: On get binary success
conditions.description: Triggered when retrieving a binary cloud save completes successfully.
conditions.display_text: On get binary cloud save [b]{0}[/b] to {2} success (bucket [i]{1}[/i])

params.name: Key
params.description: The storage key name (lowercase alphanumeric characters and dots only).

params.name: Bucket ID
params.description: The storage bucket ID (optional).

params.name: Binary Data
params.description: The Binary Data object to receive the cloud save data.

conditions.name: On get error
conditions.description: Triggered when retrieving a cloud save fails to complete.

params.name: Key
params.description: The storage key name (lowercase alphanumeric characters and dots only).

params.name: Bucket ID
params.description: The storage bucket ID (optional).

actions.name: Submit score
actions.description: Submit a score to a leaderboard.

params.name: Score
params.description: The score to submit. Must be an integer.

params.name: Leaderboard ID
params.description: The ID of the leaderboard to modify. Leave empty for the Construct Arcade.

actions.name: Sign in with provider
actions.description: Sign in with a third-party identity service.
actions.display_text: Sign in with [b]{0}[/b] for game ID [i]{1}[/i] (allow persisting [i]{2}[/i], expiry [i]{3}[/i] minutes, popup window [i]{4}[/i] x [i]{5}[/i])

params.name: Provider
params.description: The third-party service to sign in with.

params.name: Game ID
params.description: The ID of the game to sign in to.

params.name: Allow persisting
params.description: Allow re-using this sign in session later on.

params.name: Expiry
params.description: The time in minutes for sessions to remain valid. The default is 24 hours (1440 minutes).

params.name: Popup window width
params.description: The width of the authentication popup window.

params.name: Popup window height
params.description: The height of the authentication popup window.

actions.name: Sign in persistent
actions.description: Sign in using a previous session that allowed persisting.
actions.display_text: Sign in persistent for game ID [i]{0}[/i]

params.name: Game ID
params.description: The ID of the game to sign in to.

actions.name: Sign out
actions.description: Sign out of any account currently signed in to.

actions.name: Get leaderboard scores
actions.description: Retrieve a list of scores from a leaderboard.
actions.display_text: Get leaderboard [b]{0}[/b] scores (results per page [i]{1}[/i], page [i]{2}[/i], country [i]{3}[/i], range [i]{4}[/i], range offset [i]{5}[/i], culture [i]{6}[/i])

params.name: Leaderboard ID
params.description: The ID of the leaderboard to retrieve scores from.

params.name: Results per page
params.description: The number of results to retrieve, from 1 to 500.

params.name: Page
params.description: The zero-based index of the page number to retrieve.

params.name: Country
params.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code to filter results by. Leave empty to show all counties.

params.name: Range
params.description: Filter results according to a time period.

params.name: Range offset
params.description: When filtering to a time period, the offset of the time period. For example a daily time period with an offset of 1 retrieves yesterday's scores.

params.name: Culture
params.description: The locale to use for returned values. Leave empty to use the leaderboard's default culture.

actions.name: Retry sign in popup
actions.description: Make another attempt to open the sign in popup window. This should be used in a user input event like a mouse click or touch.

actions.name: Set player name
actions.description: Set the name of the currently signed in player.

params.name: Player name
params.description: The player name to set for the currently signed in player.

actions.name: Create (text)
actions.description: Create a cloud save storing text data.
actions.display_text: Create cloud save [b]{0}[/b] bucket [i]{1}[/i] name [i]{2}[/i] with data [b]{3}[/b]

params.name: Key
params.description: The storage key name (lowercase alphanumeric characters and dots only).

params.name: Bucket ID
params.description: The storage bucket ID (optional).

params.name: Name (optional)
params.description: An optional name for the data, e.g. a file name.

params.name: Data
params.description: A string of the data to save.

actions.name: Create (binary)
actions.description: Create a cloud save storing binary data.
actions.display_text: Create cloud save [b]{0}[/b] bucket [i]{1}[/i] name [i]{2}[/i] with data {3}

params.name: Key
params.description: The storage key name (lowercase alphanumeric characters and dots only).

params.name: Bucket ID
params.description: The storage bucket ID (optional).

params.name: Name (optional)
params.description: An optional name for the data, e.g. a file name.

params.name: Binary Data
params.description: The Binary Data object to use as the data to save.

actions.name: Get
actions.description: Retrieve the data of a prior cloud save.

params.name: Key
params.description: The storage key name (lowercase alphanumeric characters and dots only).

params.name: Bucket ID
params.description: The storage bucket ID (optional).

params.name: Type
params.description: Whether to download as text or binary data.

expressions.name: PlayerID
expressions.description: A unique ID for the currently signed in player.

expressions.name: PlayerName
expressions.description: The display name for the currently signed in player.

expressions.name: GameID
expressions.description: The ID of the game currently signed in to.

expressions.name: TotalPageCount
expressions.description: The total number of pages when retrieving scores.

expressions.name: ScoreAt
expressions.description: The numerical score value at an index.

params.name: Index
params.description: Score index

expressions.name: ScoreFormattedAt
expressions.description: A string of the formatted score at an index.

params.name: Index
params.description: Score index

expressions.name: ScoreRankAt
expressions.description: The numerical score rank at an index.

params.name: Index
params.description: Score index

expressions.name: ScoreFormattedRankAt
expressions.description: A string of the formatted score rank at an index.

params.name: Index
params.description: Score index

expressions.name: ScoreCountryAt
expressions.description: A string of the ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code the score at an index was submitted from.

params.name: Index
params.description: Score index

expressions.name: ScorePlayerIDAt
expressions.description: A string of the player ID that submitted the score at an index.

params.name: Index
params.description: Score index

expressions.name: ScorePlayerNameAt
expressions.description: A string of the player display name that submitted the score at an index.

params.name: Index
params.description: Score index

expressions.name: CloudSaveText
expressions.description: The text data retrieved for a cloud save.

expressions.name: CloudSaveKey
expressions.description: The key of the cloud save.

expressions.name: CloudSaveBucketID
expressions.description: The bucket ID of the cloud save.

expressions.name: CloudSaveName
expressions.description: The name of the cloud save (if specified).
